appDesc.message: AI Ghostwriter, a Chrome extension, provides real-time AI help for smoother, more effective writing.

notification_api_token_required_message.message: The OpenAI API token is not set. Please set it in the extension options.

notification_communication_error_message.message: Please open the side panel and select AI Ghostwriter.

alert_last_error.message: An error occurred while saving your settings.

alert_success.message: Your settings have been saved successfully!

shortcut_view_or_change.message: To view or change the shortcuts for this extension, please navigate to the following URL

shortcut_very_convenient.message: There is a defined shortcut for opening the side panel. It's very convenient!

content_please_enter.message: Please enter the instruction for the action you wish to take (e.g., proofread) below. The text you enter will be passed to

content_in_the_messages.message: the 'content' in the 'messages' parameter of the OpenAI's ChatAPI

api_token_is_required.message: API token is required for this extension. Please enter it above.

if_you_dont_have_api_token.message: If you don't have an API token, you can generate one

want_to_display.message: Want to display your Google Account image? Please use

the_your_account_id.message: The YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID can be found by accessing

and_executing_the_api.message: and executing the API. The response will contain people/YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID, and you can use that as your YOUR_ACCOUNT_ID. For more details, please visit

please_select_the_text.message: Please select the text on the browser, open the context menu by right-clicking, and select 'AI Ghostwriter'.
